name: Speed-Coke
description:
Based on the PepsiMan video game, you will have to run across platforms to reach the finish line and be the best soda company.

---History---

Speed-Coke, a soft drink company in decline, seeks to increase its public thanks to a Pepsi-Man-like mascot, this game is about the story of how it achieves it.

---Controls---

The controls are simple: to jump press the "space" button and to crouch press the down arrow.
